ProjectTitle: Operationally Stable Perovskite Light Emitting Diodes at High Radiance
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/05/2023
2. Data description
It's better to describe different datasets generated from a particular experiment or measurement separately and then make sure you know how best to document each of those.
The entry "Raw and processed data from electrical measurement ; Images from GIWAXS measurements; atomic force microscopic imagers; X-ray diffraction patterns; SEM images;" seems to bundle together a lot of different datasets / data types. Surely these all need to be organised and documented separately? 
4. Documentation
ReadMe files for each dataset would be good.
7. Data sharing
Why not make data available in a data repository?
